# Living in Indonesia: the ultimate expat guide
Everything you need to know for a successful life in Indonesia.
  1. [home](https://www.expat.com)
  2. /
  3. [Expat guide](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/)
  4. /
  5. [Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/)


Guide updated by[Anne-Lise Mty](https://www.expat.com/en/profile/2626397-anne-lise-mty.html), on 28 September 2022
Indonesia is known as one of the world's leading economies. Comprising not less than 17,000 islands, the world's biggest archipelago attracts expatriates in large numbers for the numerous opportunities it provides.  
  
Whether you wish to work, retire or set up your business, the coutnry can be the ideal destination for you. Living in Indonesia will also allow you to enjoy an unparalleled natural and cultural wealth.
Join the Indonesia expat community
Connect with +3M members
Share your experience and get insights from fellow expats
Create your profile ![expat.com](https://www.expat.com/v8-guide-assets/logo/default-small.svg)

## Where to live in Indonesia
  * [Bali  ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/bali/)
  * [Jakarta  ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/jakarta/)
  * [Java  ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/java/)
  * [Medan  ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/medan/)
  * [Surabaya  ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/surabaya/)


## Formalities and visas in Indonesia
All you need to know to enter Indonesia and settle in. Learn entry requirements, the documents you need, how to apply for a visa or residency, and tips to navigate the bureaucracy smoothly. 
[![Visas for Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526018692-visas-for-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526018692.jpg) Visas for Indonesia If you are planning to move to Indonesia and reside there for a while, you will need a visa ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11648-visas-for-indonesia.html)[![Retiring in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526018744-retire-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526018744.jpg) Retiring in Indonesia Like many expatriates, are you considering retiring to an idyllic island destination, enjoying some ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11623-retiring-in-indonesia.html)[![Traveling to Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526018574-discover-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526018574.jpg) Traveling to Indonesia For the many foreigners who visit the world's largest archipelago each year, formalities are ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11646-traveling-to-indonesia.html)
  * [Getting married in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/34170-getting-married-in-indonesia.html)
  * [Driving in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11631-driving-in-indonesia.html)


Get help with [administrative formalities](https://www.expat.com/en/immigration/asia/indonesia/52-200-partner.html) to settle in Indonesia.
[Learn more](https://www.expat.com/en/immigration/asia/indonesia/52-200-partner.html)
## Working in Indonesia
Boost your international career. Understand the local labour market, the legal framework, how to adapt your resume, apply to job offers and tips to find a job in Indonesia.
[![Working in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526020629-work-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526020629.jpg) Working in Indonesia As one of the major regional economic powerhouses in Southeast Asia, Indonesia ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11650-work-in-indonesia.html)[![Starting a business in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526019764-setting-up-a-business-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526019764.jpg) Starting a business in Indonesia Thanks to the country's large population, affordable labor force, and abundant ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11641-setting-up-a-business-in-indonesia.html)[![Internships in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526019849-internships-news_item_full-t1526019849.jpg) Internships in Indonesia Do you wish to acquire hands-on experience, gain new professional skills and expand ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11629-internships-in-indonesia.html)
  * [Working in Indonesia as a digital nomad](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/15890-become-a-digital-nomad-in-indonesia.html)


[Find a job](https://www.expat.com/en/jobs/asia/indonesia/) in Indonesia and boost your career.
[Browse job offers](https://www.expat.com/en/jobs/asia/indonesia/)
## Finance and banks in Indonesia
Tips to manage your money in Indonesia: from opening a bank account, transferring funds to filling your tax and understanding the fiscal system.
[![Banking in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526021222-opening-a-bank-acc-news_item_full-t1526021222.jpg) Banking in Indonesia Upon moving to Indonesia, you may need to open a local bank account. This will definitely allow you to better manage your financial ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11625-opening-a-bank-account-in-indonesia.html)
[![Taxes in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526021302-tax-news_item_full-t1526021302.jpg) Taxes in Indonesia If you plan to live in Indonesia for more than 183 days over a period of 12 months, you will be considered a resident taxpayer from the date of ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11643-tax-in-indonesia.html)
[Choose a bank](https://www.expat.com/en/bank/asia/indonesia/) that understands your expat needs.
[Learn more](https://www.expat.com/en/bank/asia/indonesia/)
## Health care in Indonesia
Understand the healthcare system in Indonesia: public and private health system, health insurance options, how to access medical care...
[![Healthcare in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526021498-healthcare-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526021498.jpg) Healthcare in Indonesia The standards of the Indonesian healthcare system are not comparable to Western ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11630-health-care-in-indonesia.html)[![Accidents and emergencies in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1664359381-ambulance-news_item_full-t1664359381.jpg) Accidents and emergencies in Indonesia Medical emergencies or accidents are always difficult to deal with when you are in a foreign ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/35023-accidents-and-emergencies-in-indonesia.html)[![Having a baby in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1662469813-pregnancy-news_item_full-t1662469813.jpg) Having a baby in Indonesia If you are about to have a baby in Indonesia, you should be aware that the medical services ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/35009-pregnancy-and-childbirth-in-indonesia.html)
[Protect your health](https://www.expat.com/en/insurance/asia/indonesia/) during your expat journey.
[Get a quote](https://www.expat.com/en/insurance/asia/indonesia/)
## Education and schools in Indonesia
Discover schooling options in Indonesia: public, private or international institutions and curricula, enrollment procedures, and costs. Find the right education for your children abroad.
[![Study in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526020435-study-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526020435.jpg) Study in Indonesia Indonesia has the third largest education system in Asia, with over 3 million teachers and 50 million students attending 300,000 schools in ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11642-study-in-indonesia.html)
## Accommodation in Indonesia
Explore real estate or temporary rentals in Indonesia. Find out more about renting or buying a house or a flat, real estate agents, leases and rental agreements.
[![Accommodation in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526020691-accommodation-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526020691.jpg) Accommodation in Indonesia Many of the expatriates living in Indonesia prefer renting accommodation owing to the generally limited duration of their stay and the ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11636-accommodation-in-indonesia.html)
[Explore housing options](https://www.expat.com/en/housing/asia/indonesia/) and find your home in Indonesia.
[Browse properties](https://www.expat.com/en/housing/asia/indonesia/)
## Planning your move to Indonesia
Moving to Indonesia? Get advice and tips to planning your relocation, choosing the best company, packing your belongings and managing customs procedures.
[![Moving to Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526023196-moving-to-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526023196.jpg) Moving to Indonesia Planning is essential before any relocation project, including moving to Indonesia. It can ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11626-moving-to-indonesia.html)
[![Moving to Indonesia with your pet](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526023411-moving-with-pets-news_item_full-t1526023411.jpg) Moving to Indonesia with your pet Moving to Indonesia with a pet is not a risk-free operation, mainly due to stray animals ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11645-traveling-to-indonesia-with-your-pet.html)
[Find the right moving service](https://www.expat.com/en/movers/asia/indonesia/) to relocate to Indonesia.
[Get a quote](https://www.expat.com/en/movers/asia/indonesia/)
## Leisure in Indonesia
Enjoy you free time while living in Indonesia. Discover sports, leisure, cultural activities and entertainment options to make the most of your expat life.
[![Leisure and lifestyle in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526022865-leisure-news_item_full-t1526022865.jpg) Leisure and lifestyle in Indonesia As an expatriate, your life in Indonesia will undoubtedly be very different from the one you led in your home country. However, if you are ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11628-leisure-in-indonesia.html)
## Everyday life in Indonesia
Want to know what life in Indonesia is really like? Here's a taste: explore the country, find tips to use transportation, to set up internet and phone services, and everything you need to live like a local.
[![Transportation in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526023058-transport-news_item_full-t1526023058.jpg) Transportation in Indonesia Getting around the big cities of Indonesia is no small challenge due to the traffic jams and ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11644-transports-in-indonesia.html)[![Communications in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526022547-phones-and-internet-in-indonesia-news_item_full-t1526022547.jpg) Communications in Indonesia In Indonesia, you will have no trouble getting your home connected to the internet. But ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11624-phones-and-internet-in-indonesia.html)[![Useful contacts and resources in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/upload/guide/1526985049-shutterstock-368703884-news_item_full-t1526985049.jpg) Useful contacts and resources in Indonesia In an expatriation project, health matters tend to take on an even greater place in the planning ... ](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/11647-useful-contacts-in-indonesia.html)

  * [Dating in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/35011-dating-in-indonesia.html)
  * [Childcare in Indonesia](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/34171-childcare-in-indonesia.html)
  * [Save Yourself, Hire a Driver](https://www.expat.com/en/guide/asia/indonesia/2437-save-yourself-hire-a-driver.html)

### News & testimonies
  * [![Indonesia C18 visa: New rules for foreign workers on trial](https://www.expat.com/images/upload/1/1/7/6/8/1750757365-foreman-or-worker-work-at-factory-site-check-up-ma-2025-03-15-20-55-54-utc-news_item_related_300-t1750757365.jpg) Indonesia C18 visa: New rules for foreign workers on trial According to the Directorate General of Immigration, the aim is to prevent the exploitation of foreign workers. Since June 14, 2025, new rules have been in place to more strictly regulate the C18 stay permit (C18 visa). Also known as the "Work Trial" visa, the C18 is intended for workers coming to Indonesia to complete a trial period with a sponsoring company—the company where the trial will be carried out.  ](https://www.expat.com/en/expat-mag/11771-indonesia-tightens-c18-visa-rules-to-protect-foreign-workers.html)
  * [![Indonesia announces new strategies to attract qualified and wealthy expatriates](https://www.expat.com/images/upload/8/6/4/6/1685958086-jakarta-news_item_related_300-t1685958086.jpg) Indonesia announces new strategies to attract qualified and wealthy expatriates Indonesia is currently implementing new strategies to support the strong economic recovery observed in 2022. In addition to reforming its economy and encouraging innovation, the government is counting on wealthy and skilled foreigners. The health crisis has turned the organization of work upside down, and digital nomadism is at its peak. As a country that aims to become one of the top 5 largest economies by 2045, Indonesia is also luring wealthy investors.  ](https://www.expat.com/en/expat-mag/8656-attracting-skilled-and-wealthy-expatriates-indonesias-ambitions-for-economic-development.html)
  * [![Small town to bustling city: Expat life in Surabaya](https://www.expat.com/images/upload/8/9/7/1490951886-cover-news_item_related_300-t1490951886.jpg) Small town to bustling city: Expat life in Surabaya Wayne yearned for something bigger than the small-town life he had grown accustomed to, and decided to explore what lies beyond Canada's borders. His travels took him to Asia, where he ended up remaining, eventually settling in Surabaya, Indonesia. Here, he shares with Expat.com his thoughts about his expat journey and life in Indonesia.  ](https://www.expat.com/en/expat-mag/897-making-a-home-in-surabaya-indonesia.html)
  * [![Cassandra: "Jakarta is easy to live"](https://www.expat.com/images/upload/1/8/5/1425510000-cassandrajakarta1-news_item_related_300-t1471428280.png) Cassandra: "Jakarta is easy to live" Cassandra left Singapore, her home country, to live in Indonesia as her husband got a job opportunity in the country. They settled in Jakarta with their children... ](https://www.expat.com/en/expat-mag/185-cassandra-in-jakarta.html)
